charaepi_ch0203_00_kate/2301_1101_0100_2:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was battling against
Argenta and Skarmory, who [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] met on a
mountain road.
charaepi_ch0203_00_kate/2301_1101_0200_2:
They were battling because Argenta wanted to
see [Name:PlayerNickname ]’s brilliance.
charaepi_ch0203_00_kate/2301_1201_0400_1: I can see your brilliance as a sync pair is genuine.
charaepi_ch0203_00_kate/2301_1201_0500_1:
Your relationship is wonderful. You have each
other’s back.
charaepi_ch0203_00_kate/2301_1201_0600_1:
Your feelings and love for Pokémon are beyond
belief, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0203_00_kate/2301_1201_0700_1:
If you don’t mind, could you tell this lady why you
chose this Pokémon as your partner?
charaepi_ch0203_00_kate/2301_0401_0900_1:
I see... You stuck with your favorite Pokémon and
honed your skills.
charaepi_ch0203_00_kate/2301_0302_1000_1: I felt a spark when we met.
charaepi_ch0203_00_kate/2301_0402_1100_1: Excellent! Such instincts shouldn’t be taken lightly.
charaepi_ch0203_00_kate/2301_1201_1200_1:
I can see you genuinely care about your
partner Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0203_00_kate/2301_1201_1300_1:
There’s a place for any and every kind of
Pokémon to shine, but...
charaepi_ch0203_00_kate/2301_1201_1400_1: I can see your partner shines most next to you.
charaepi_ch0203_00_kate/2301_1201_1500_1:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], a Trainer strong
enough to defeat me...
charaepi_ch0203_00_kate/2301_1201_1600_1:
And your capable partner Pokémon... Such a
wonderful combination, isn’t it?
charaepi_ch0203_00_kate/2301_1201_1700_1: I bet you and your partner are happy to have met.
charaepi_ch0203_00_kate/2301_1201_1800_1:
But just because a sync pair’s good doesn’t mean
it’ll win.
charaepi_ch0203_00_kate/2301_1201_1900_1:
A Pokémon’s strength will change depending on
the circumstances.
charaepi_ch0203_00_kate/2301_1201_2000_1:
It’s not uncommon to be caught off guard by an
opponent you think is below you.
charaepi_ch0203_00_kate/2301_1201_2100_1:
In a way, the sync pair system on Pasio is similar
to the Battle Hall...
charaepi_ch0203_00_kate/2301_1201_2200_1:
in which you choose your favorite Pokémon and
compete in battle.
charaepi_ch0203_00_kate/2301_1201_2300_1:
A cornered Pokémon displaying unbelievable
strength to make a comeback and win...
charaepi_ch0203_00_kate/2301_1201_2400_1:
I’ve seen it many times, doubting my own eyes
each time.
charaepi_ch0203_00_kate/2301_0401_2600_1:
You’re truly earnest, aren’t you. That’s what’s nice
about you!
charaepi_ch0203_00_kate/2301_0302_2700_1:
I won’t drop my guard
against anyone!
charaepi_ch0203_00_kate/2301_0402_2800_1:
And don’t you forget it. You never know what’ll
happen in a Pokémon battle.
charaepi_ch0203_00_kate/2301_1201_2900_1:
And now, having rambled for so long, this lady
has nothing left to say at all!
charaepi_ch0203_00_kate/2301_1201_3000_1:
After all, on Pasio, I’m just one of
many challengers.
charaepi_ch0203_00_kate/2301_1201_3100_1:
Together with my perfect partner Pokémon,
Skarmory, whom I chose...
charaepi_ch0203_00_kate/2301_1201_3200_1:
I’ll prove there’s a place for every Pokémon
to shine.
charaepi_ch0203_00_kate/2301_1201_3300_1:
Seeing Skarmory defeat legendary Trainers and
Pokémon over and over...
charaepi_ch0203_00_kate/2301_1201_3400_1: It’s going to be the most elegant sight of all!
